name: Supreme Scepter
introduction: Do you want to have supreme rights? Do you want to be respected by Zeus? Hera will destroy you without batting an eye if your answer is yes.

awakening_skills.description: Song of war (Hero Hymn): 10% of Hera's Crit DMG and FOR will be added in [Encourage]
For the Throne (Supreme Glory): Increase the coefficient of Hera's M.DMG by 30%, and the DMG must be doubled.
Twilight: ATK+10%, DEF+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, Conqueror of Legends, and friends battle)
